name: Canek: Quest for Corn [Demo]
description: Canek: Quest for Corn is a single player action platform game (under development). Meet Canek, a legendary hero on an epic quest to save the Maya civilization from the curse that threatens its people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
